column2: Armed robbers hit Paris Apple store PARIS
column3: Jan 1 Armed robbers targeted an Apple Inc  store in central Paris on New Year's Eve
column4: taking thousands of euros (dollars) worth of goods
column5: a police official said on Tuesday.

column2: Best Buy loses two board directors Dec 31 Best Buy Co Inc said on Monday that two of its board directors had resigned
column3: including one of its former chief executives
column4: almost seven months after its founder
column5: who is now mounting a bid for the struggling retailer

column2: Goldman execs cash in $26.8 mln in stock on New Year's Eve Jan 1 Goldman Sachs Group Inc Chief Executive Lloyd Blankfein and departing Chief Financial Officer David Viniar both exercised restricted stock units on New Year's Eve that delivered them $4.2 million in cash apiece.
